age.description: Time in milliseconds since the event was sent.

content.title: EventContent
content.description: The content of this event. The fields in this object will vary depending on the type of event.

event_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this event.

origin_server_ts.description: Timestamp in milliseconds on originating homeserver when this event was sent.

prev_content.title: EventContent
prev_content.description: Optional. The previous ``content`` for this state. This will be present only for state events appearing in the ``timeline``. If this is not a state event, or there is no previous content, this key will be missing.

prev_sender.description: Optional. The ``sender`` of the previous event for this state. This will be present only for state events appearing in the ``timeline``. If this is not a state event, or there was no previous event for this state, this key will be missing.

sender.description: The MXID of the user who sent this event.

state_key.description: Optional. This key will only be present for state events. A unique key which defines the overwriting semantics for this piece of room state.

txn_id.description: Optional. The transaction ID set when this message was sent. This key will only be present for message events sent by the device calling this API.
